name: Larry Davis
text:
Service was excellent, Pizza was ready for pick-up when promised, it was hot and tasty!
A LOCAL BUSINESS WITH COMPETIVE PRICES AND GOOD QUALITY PRODUCTS!!

name: Martinique Junebug
text: The driver who delivered our pizza did not reach the proper location, and, despite the website saying they would need to see the credit card and ID of the credit card user, they gave the pizza to the wrong house without asking for either of ‚Ä¶More

name: Richard Oney
text: Always love hungry Howie's to bad drive from COLUMBUS to get there.  Why is that the only one left in the state of Ohio? Wish you put one back on campus of osu

name: Dan Downing
text: Great pizza.  Love their wings too.

name: Stephanie B
text: Ordered contactless delivery and my driver left my order at some random house. Didn‚Äôt even wait to confirm they were at the right address. Called dominos and they did it in a wonderfully executed fashion. ‚Ä¶More

name: Marissa Garcia
text: Their crust is amazing but tonight they went above and beyond! Stuck at home with 2 hungry little ones and the fianc√© is in a boot so he can‚Äôt get around well but went out anyway! Well, someone forgot the salad. No big deal, I asked he call ‚Ä¶More

name: Kellie Young
text: Pizza here is hit or miss. I've had it hot and fresh as well as Luke warm and not cooked. I usually go because of the coupon card (buy 1 large get a med free) so it doesnt cost a fortune. I went in for carryout a few weeks ago and when I ‚Ä¶More

name: Dennis Rousseau
text: We haven't been to another Pizzaria since you opened. You guys are so good Gordon Ramsay wouldn't yell at you.

name: Frank Robinson
text: Some what improving.

name: Ron Matley
text: Ordered a Turkey sub and a Ham sub for pickup. Got two ham subs. I know that she was clear on what I was ordering. I don‚Äôt think it was that important to her. At least that is how I felt and my order reflected it.

name: Kim S
text: Parents just moved to Delaware this week, and while unpacking we decided to try a new pizza place. My dad ordered by calling in, they took his order, and then we sat for 90 minutes. Finally called them again, only to find out they didn't ‚Ä¶More

name: matt henderson
text: This is the first time back to Hungry Howie's since we left Florida in 2009. We recently moved here and discovered this restaurant here in Delaware Ohio. It's just as awesome as we remember. Get the garlic herb crust! It's amazing!

name: Emma K
text: our pizza was over an hour late but when we called the employee explained the whole situation and we got a discount on a 2 topping pizza!! he was very understanding about his driver quiting on him and made sure our pizza was still hot when we got it!!

name: Andrew Sisler
text: Very tasty other than the kangaroo and on top of that the kangaroo was still alive

name: Tony Cimini
text: Subs are great. Different but great.

name: martin hicks
text: Would rather eat cardboard

name: Phil Temple
text: Absolutely no complaints what so ever. Love the food, love the service.

name: Amy Ross
text: Very good food

name: Shawn Zuber
text: This is the worst hungry howies I have ever been to the service is awful. Many times I have gone in a my order is wrong or not done or forgotten about. They will tell you 20 minutes and an hour later you are still waiting for the food. I only do carry out i would hate delivery is like.

name: Mike Hardin
text: Bland pizza. It's for children not for adults who want to enjoy a tasty pizza. Other than that, I've not had any problems here. The people were friendly and the facility was relatively clean.

name: Ree Smale
text: Got "subs" were more like calzones but were really good

name: Taekyung Lee
text: Great menu variety  great food exellet service staff is super nice food is fantastic tasting hot quick and fresh my new go to for pizza in this town thanks guys! The staff was friendly and looked to be working very hard to make fantastic pizzas!!!!!!!!!!

name: zack sabo
text: Went there there to get my pizza I ordered and paid for online about 20 min ago.. Walk in give her my name she hands me this order and gives me a total similar to mine.. I told her I paid online she said ‚ÄúYour Zack aren‚Äôt you‚Äù I got tired ‚Ä¶More

name: Kimberly Crouch
text: Really getting skimpy on their toppings. The cheesy bread hardly had any cheese on it.

name: Barbara Burgess
text: Delicious

name: Megan Brooks
text: Their pizza is disgusting. I will never order again. They also put the wrong season on the crust that we ordered and the topping was placed only in the middle of the pizza.

name: Justin Mullen
text: Absolutely love this place in Florida. So glad I was able to find it in ohio

name: Timothy H
text: Ordered delivery twice in the last couple of months and it was great both times. Love the flavored crust options.

name: Entillon shadow
text: you dont deliver out here AGAIN for some reason either deliver or DONT but thats HOWUDOIT losers

name: Matt Runyon
text: Horrible experience. I understand people make mistakes but to double charge me and give me a 35$ overdraft fee. Then after all that you don't even give me a credit back to me.  Plus I got it delivered so when the 75$ pizza arrived it was ‚Ä¶More

name: Joseph Heath
text: Glad to have a hungry howie's within delivery distance!üòÅ

name: Mike Conner
text: Called order in and went to pick up and had under wrong name took awhile to figure out what was mine. Pizza wasn't much better than frozen pizza and way  overpriced First and last time I will ever get pizza from there

name: John Scott
text: Ordered online for delivery, everything was exactly as ordered and phone app even showed when it was on the road. Food was delicious. We got a large 2 item with a coupon ($10) and when I switched the crust to thin it knocked another dollar off. Also got a sub special ordered - as ordered. Don't overestimate, it's a pizza place.

name: R B
text: $10 extra for 5 toppings but hardly any toppings on the pizza.  I've had pizza from here for years and still will but only if delco won't answer the phone as usual.  Employees are nice but pizza is more made for the soccer team etc.  Not pizza you would buy just to enjoy.

name: Nicklaus Cherup
text: We asked for the best joke they had wrote on the box. We were very pleased with the joke! They forgot our cheesey bread and we called them, they were super nice about it and made us a new one and gave us free brownies! We love you guys!

name: Daniel Miller
text:
I love the thin crust pizza
All the ingredients taste super fresh
Good service, great staff ‚Ä¶More

name: Kelsey Warner
text: This is great pizza and prices can't be beat. Go for the garlic crust! The staff are always so friendly and helpful with figuring out coupons.

name: Jared Arbogast
text: Hungry Howie's has been great till today we spend outrageous amount of money and have it delivered almost every weekend and tip them every time we live on the corner of Hedley and Radnor and now they won't deliver at all and we technically ‚Ä¶More

name: Adam Cox
text: Great food

name: Alissa Ryan
text: Just ordered about an hour ago. Driver gets there and before we realized something was missing and could say anything he was back in car and gone. We call the store and tell them what was missing. They act like they're making a new one and ‚Ä¶More

name: Carol Lester
text: Delicious and great deals! Love that I can get the lunch calzone special all day!

name: Dana M
text: Have ordered from here before and the food is horrible. Too greasy and the food is usually not correct. Have had pieces of my order missing as well. The customers and employees are treated horribly. Recently had a friend working there and ‚Ä¶More

name: Dave Hohman
text: Great lunch deals. How is rolls are great.

name: Sarah Meyst
text: I haven't ordered from here in a while, tonight I ordered a Italian calzone, not much meat and the tomatoes were horrible! No banana peppers! We need really good pizza and sub and calzones place here in Delaware! This will be my last time!!!

name: Degenerate F√∫rr√Ω
text: Needs better crust.

name: My Name
text: Great pizza at a great price and always friendly and ready on time for pick up.

name: BJ Cantrell
text: We eat here a lot. You can't beat the prices unless you get a Baron Card from someone in the Buckeye Valley Schools.  With the card you buy one large pizza and get a second one free... I don't know of anywhere else that you can get 2 large pizzas for under $14.00.

name: Carlos Vazquez
text: Im love all the time im call for carzon and pizza peperroni and beef

name: Evan M
text: Nice enough employees but sub par pizza. Good if you need something cheap.

name: Tricia Kalmar
text: We order every Friday for lunch at our office.  The pineapple & tomato on thin crust is delicious and the staff are all so nice!

name: Robert California
text: Good stuff at fair prices.

name: christopher esterly
text: Great food, prompt service.

name: Samantha Brooks
text: Made fresh and so freaking good!

name: Nana73 Carol
text: Good pizza.

name: Shanda Ferrell
text: Over 2hr late. Cold. Very rude staff.

name: Joseph Robbins
text: Great

name: Chris Tannuzzo
text: I've had better

name: Chris Godby
text: Worth the three hour drive.

text:
